Hey, I'm interested in creating my own currency on Verus. What is required to create a currency of a specific name on Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
To create a currency of a specific name on Verus, you need an ID of the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency of that name, and they can only do so once. So, if you want to create a currency called "MyCoin", you would need to have an ID called "MyCoin" and be the controller of that ID.

The `preallocations` field in the `definecurrency` command is really useful. It allows you to specify an initial allocation of the new currency to specific IDs.
